# Services

<p align="left"><img src="https://www.vectorlogo.zone/logos/kubernetes/kubernetes-icon.svg" width="80" alt="kube_logo"></p>

## Commands

### Expose

```sh
kubectl expose pod redis --port=6379 --name redis-service
```
